Take $\mathbb{R}$ to be your reference set, and consider these subsets:

$$
\begin{align*}
A&=[1,\,5]\\
B&=\{x\in\mathbb{R}\,:\,|x|>2\}\\
C&=(-\infty,\,0]\\
I_n&=\left[0,\,\frac{1}{n}\right]
\end{align*}
$$

Express each of the following in as simplified and concise a form as possible:

a.  $A^c$
a.  $A \cup B$
a.  $A\cap C$
a.  $A\cap C^c$
a.  $B \cap C^c$
a.  $A^c \cap B^c \cap C^c$
a.  $(A \cup B) \cap C$
a.  $\bigcap_{n=1}^\infty I_n$
a.  $\bigcup_{n=1}^\infty I_n$
